attributes.action: refuse to recommend a peerage for the Speaker, Michael Martin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin has been the worst speaker of parliament in living memory and as a consequence has been the first speaker to be booted out for over 300 years. The Prime Minister should demonstrate his new but belated intentions for better governance, by refusing to reward failure and ensuring that the House of Lords is not afflicted with a gentleman's club peerage for Michael Martin.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
